R0016.title: Metric Manipulation / Ranking Fraud
R0016.definition: Interfering with certain application metrics by repeatedly clicking links, sending requests, or submitting forms.
R0016.description: Automatically and repeatedly clicking, requesting, or submitting content to influence application-based metrics such as frequency and/or rate counts and measurements. Includes ranking fraud, like farming, comment farming, etc. Metrics may be visible to users (e.g., betting odds, likes, market/dynamic pricing, visitor counts, vote results, reviews) or hidden (e.g., application usage statistics, business performance metrics).
R0016.influence: Causes platform display results to lose objectivity and fairness, degrading user experience.

R0016-001.title: Fake Viewer Count Inflation
R0016-001.definition: Using illegitimate means or software to artificially inflate the visitor count of a live stream room or personal space, creating a false impression of high traffic, ultimately influencing platform recommendation algorithms.
R0016-001.description: Also called 'fake audience' or 'ghost viewers'. Typically refers to using software, bots, or crowdsourcing to artificially increase metrics such as page views, likes, comments, and online viewer counts for a web page or live stream room, thereby influencing the platform's scoring and recommendation or ranking of that space.
R0016-001.influence: Undermines platform fairness and interferes with ranking algorithms.

references.title: Methods and Strategies for Inflating TikTok Live Stream Viewer Counts

R0016-002.title: Bulk Following
R0016-002.definition: Using illegitimate means or software to bulk-follow other users, ultimately influencing platform recommendations.
R0016-002.description: Also called 'mass following'. Typically refers to using software, bots, or crowdsourcing to have a user bulk-follow other users, thereby influencing the platform's scoring and recommendation or ranking of that user.
R0016-002.influence: Undermines platform fairness and interferes with ranking algorithms.
